email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out with a freight offer for 12,000MT of Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 20th to 25th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 41.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charters

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 14,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 20th to 25th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.75 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charters

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 20th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charters
